header.browserupgrade: I know you have a special loyalty to IE, but he's a little too old... you should at least Upgrade to IE 11!
header.noscript: You've blocked javascript! We won't be able to deliver packages to you if you do!

footer.privacy:

Form.Cant_EMPTY: This place cannot be left blank~~
Form.min_date: Date must be on or after today

Pass.title: Set new password
Pass.description: Since you are logging in for the first time and using the default password, please change your password first.
Pass.NotMach: The password entered twice is incorrect~~
condition: Condition
At least one uppercase english is required
At least one lowercase english is required
At least 8 characters are required
Cannot be the same as email address or name

ChangeSetting.title: Settings | IVE airline

Email.addMSG: Modification requires re-confirmation of email address. If you log out before confirming, you will not be able to log in again. You need to confirm before you can log in (you can still modify it without logging out)

Pass.NotMach: The password entered twice is incorrect~~
condition: Condition
At least one uppercase english is required
At least one lowercase english is required
At least 8 characters are required
Cannot be the same as email address or name

2FA.title: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
2FA.is_not_Enable: Enable two-factor verification! Add an extra layer of security to your account and save yourself a worry~ (～￣▽￣)～
is_Enable: Write down the security code so you can use it if you lose your phone. Keeping you safe. ╰(￣ω￣o)
The account will not work without the security code, you will need to contact customer service to retrieve the account. <(__ __)>

body: Scan the QR code below with a two-factor authentication program (such as Google Authenticator) on your mobile phone!! (｡A｡)
Failed? Can't scan? You can try entering the code below! (๑•̀ㅂ•́)و✧

TwoFA_confirm_off_modal.title: Seriously?
TwoFA_confirm_off_modal.body: After resetting, the account will have one less layer of protection and one more worry. Do you really want to do this? (⊙﹏⊙)

TwoFA_BackupCode_modal.title: Security Code
TwoFA_BackupCode_modal.body: These are your security codes, please put them in a safe place. Of course it would be best if you could encrypt it! (￣︶￣)↗

Form.Cant_EMPTY: This place cannot be left blank~~
Form.Error_format: The email format should not be like this
Form.Match_Old_Pass: It must be different from the old password~~

BackupCode.content: These are your security codes, please keep them in a safe place. It would be best if you could encrypt it! (￣︶￣)↗

AUTH_CHANGESETTING_2FA_OFF_OK: It has been reset successfully ヾ(^▽^*)))
AUTH_CHANGESETTING_2FA_OFF_FAIL: If the situation persists, please contact customer service
AUTH_CHANGESETTING_2FA_CHECK_CODE_FAIL: Rescan and enter again~ Or you entered wrong (if the situation persists, please contact customer service)
AUTH_CHANGESETTING_2FA_CHECK_CODE_OK: It has been enable successfully ヾ(^▽^*)))
The next time you log in, you need to enter this mysterious code!
AUTH_CHANGESETTING_2FA_SHOWBACKUPCODE_FA: If the situation persists, please contact customer service
AUTH_CHANGESETTING_DATA_FAIL: If the situation persists, please contact customer service
AUTH_CHANGESETTING_DATA_FAIL_NOT_MATCH: Name is too long or email is malformed...
AUTH_CHANGESETTING_PASS_OK: Remember to use your new password to log in!
AUTH_CHANGESETTING_PASS_FAIL: If the situation persists, please contact customer service
AUTH_CHANGESETTING_PASS_FAIL_NOT_STRONG: The password is not too strong!
AUTH_CHANGESETTING_PASS_FAIL_NOT_MATCH: The password entered twice is not the same!

Login.title: Login | IVE airline
Login.go_register: You don't have an account and want to use it? Register now
Login.WRONG_PASS: Oh Nooooo! Email or password is incorrect!
Login.NOT_DOEN: Hey! You can't be so impatient! Go check your mailbox!
Login.REGISTER_COMPLETE: Yes! You are done! Log in now!
Login.go_back_home: Don't want to log in yet? Then go back first
BLOCK_10: Sorry~~ You failed too many times! Wait 10 minutes and try again~~
If you forget your password, you can try recover it
BLOCK_30: Sorry~~ You failed too many times! Wait 30 minutes and try again~~
If you forget your password, you can try recover it

Form.Cant_EMPTY: This place cannot be left blank
Form.Error_format: The email format should not be like this

TwoFA.2FA_WRONG: Ah Oh! The mysterious code is wrong!
TwoFA.welcome: Hello! Just get the secret code from your mobile app and enter it
TwoFA.ReDo: Enter the wrong account number? Enter it again
TwoFA.Can't_use_phone:
Can't use your phone?
You can directly enter 1 of the 6 security codes (づ￣3￣)づ╭❤～

Form.empty: This place cannot be left empty

Register.title: Registration | IVE airline
Register.EMAIL_FAIL: Ah Oh! I can't send emails! Check for typos~~
Register.PASS_NOT_MATCH: Ah Oh! The passwords entered twice are not the same!
Register.PASS_NOT_STRONG: Umm.. the password is not too strong!

Register.NEED_AGREE: Hey! You need to agree to Terms of Service and Privacy Policy to register!
Register.YOUR_BOT: Ah Oh! You are a robot and cannot register! (Or you have not verified)

Register.welcome: Sign up if you want to use it

Error_Page.Dont_Come: Hey hey hey! You shouldn't be here!
Error_Page.404_title: Where have you been! | IVE airline
Error_Page.400_title: There was a problem with the request!

Block_login.title: Block login
Block_login.detailed:
You have quickly blocked this login!!
Change your password as soon as possible before the other party responds!! (๑•̀ㅂ•́)و✧

activated.subject: The last step! That's it!
content: The last step! Click on it! That's it!
The link is only valid for 1 day! Take your time!
If the button is clicked and there is no response, just move the link below to the browser!
If you have any questions, please send an email to

forgetPass.subject: The password reset you requested has been sent!
content: The last step! Click it! Change the password! That's it!
The link is only valid for 1 hour! Take your time!
If the button is clicked and there is no response, just move the link below to the browser!
If you have any questions, please send an email to

Wong-newIP.subject: Someone logged into your account! Σ(っ °Д °;)っ
content: Someone has logged into your account in a different place!
We recommend that you check the following information immediately if you are logged in yourself
If you log in yourself, you don't need to pay attention. Otherwise, please block this login immediately!ヽ（≧□≦)ノ
Click me to block this login
If the button is clicked and there is no response, just move the link below to the browser!

Confirm_Reserve.title: Confirm Reserve
Confirm_Reserve.description: Please confirm the following information is correct.

Need_login.title: Need Login
Need_login.description: You need to login first to reserve. (You will be redirected in 3 seconds)

Content.alert: You have already reserve this flight. If you need to modify or cancel it, please go to the Flight Reserved page
Fail: Failed to process request, please try again later
Success: You have successfully reserved your seat!

Delete_modal.title: Confirm Cancel
Delete_modal.description: Are you sure you want to cancel this flight reservation?

Fail: Failed to process request, please try again later
Success_Modify: You have successfully Modify your reserved!
Success_Delete: You have successfully Cancel your reserved!
